Articles.Content: As in, where is the file? So I can copy/share my costum categories. I copied my save to a backup folder and everything is fine but my costum categories are not appearing. I spent hours on that thing
I was just wondering this same thing. Also, can custom categories be easily modded?

After a fair bit of digging, I found mine buried in the GameData folder:

KSP/GameData/Squad/PartList/SubassemblyCategories.cfg

There doesn't seem to be anything tying it to a particular save file though.


CUSTOM_SUBASSEMBLY_SUBCATEGORY{
SUBCATEGORY
{
categoryName = Launchers
icon = R&D_node_icon_heavierrocketry
SUBASSEMBLIES
{
subassembly = Low mass launcher
subassembly = Medium mass launcher
subassembly = Medium-Heavy Launcher
subassembly = Heavy mass Launcher
}
}
}
Yes, I really do give my launcher subassemblies those horribly generic names 
I think custom part categories will be stored in the same place, possibly in a different file; I haven't had a need for them yet, personally.


Edited December 30, 2014 by armagheddonsgw

I was just wondering this same thing. Also, can custom categories be easily modded?

Should be able to. RealChute adds a parachute category.

Really good find Anquietas314 !

 

It's like almost 2 years later but you saved me a ton of searching.
